title: Abortion and Crime, Revisited (Ep. 384 Update)
description: As the Supreme Court considers overturning Roe v. Wade, we look back at Steve Levitt’s controversial research on an unintended consequence of the 1973 ruling.
author: editor@freakonomics.com (Freakonomics Radio + Stitcher)
